comments:
I'm using a recent WTP 2.0.1 I-build, at most two weeks old. I created a Java class named EmployeeJPA, added annotations, and used some of the Dali views to tweak the settings. I then used JDT refactoring to rename the class to Employee, and the Dali hooks correctly prompted to refactor orm.xml and persistence.xml.

The refactoring appeared to work ok, but then the Eclipse error dialog appeared with the following exception. Every time I typed in Employee.java the dialog reappears, making it almost impossible to update the class. Had to restart to stop the errors.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-09-05 21:54:46.718
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Resynching JPA model ...".
!STACK 0
java.lang.RuntimeException: Java Model Exception: Java Model Status [EmployeeJPA.java [in com.ibm [in ejbModule [in EmployeeEJB]]] does not exist]
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaPersistentType.superclassTypeSignature(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaPersistentType.refreshParentPersistentType(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.content.java.JavaPersistentType.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.JavaTypeContext.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.JavaEntityContext.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.PersistenceUnitContext.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaProjectContext.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaProjectContext.refreshDefaults(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.platform.BaseJpaPlatform.resynch(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.JpaProject$1.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: Java Model Exception: Java Model Status [EmployeeJPA.java [in com.ibm [in ejbModule [in EmployeeEJB]]] does not exist]
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.newJavaModelException(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.CompilationUnit.buildStructure(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Openable.generateInfos(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.SourceRefElement.generateInfos(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.openWhenClosed(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.getElementInfo(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.getElementInfo(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.SourceType.getSuperclassTypeSignature(Unknown Source)
	... 11 more

This is not an exact duplicate of 199715, but this issue was brought up there and should be resolved in today's 2.0.1 build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 199715 ***
